vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G4614', 'matchingForm': 'Σινᾶ', 'stepTransliteration': 'sina', 'gloss': '(Mount )Sinai', '_searchResultRange': 'Acts.7.30-Gal.4.25@Exod.3.1-Gal.4.25', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '西乃', '_es_Gloss': 'Sinaí', '_zh_Gloss': '西乃'}, {'strongNumber': 'H2722', 'matchingForm': 'חֹרֵב', 'stepTransliteration': 'cho.rev', 'gloss': 'Horeb', '_searchResultRange': 'Exod.3.1-Mal.4.4@Exod.3.1-Gal.4.25', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '何烈山', '_es_Gloss': 'Horeb', '_zh_Gloss': '何烈山'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5514H', 'matchingForm': 'סִינַי', 'stepTransliteration': 'si.nay', 'gloss': ' of Sinai', '_searchResultRange': 'Exod.19.1-Num.33.16', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '西乃', '_es_Gloss': 'Sinaí', '_zh_Gloss': '西乃'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Sinai = "thorny"
the mountain where Moses received the Law from Jehovah; located at the southern end of the Sinai peninsula between the horns of the Red Sea; exact site unknown
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西乃 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "多刺的"
山名, 摩西在此領受了耶和華的律法; 位於西乃半島的南端(在紅海海角,
即紅海及紅海伸入阿拉伯半島的海灣之間); 確實地點不詳
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
西乃 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "多刺的"
山名, 摩西在此领受了耶和华的律法; 位于西乃半岛的南端(在红海海角,
即红海及红海伸入阿拉伯半岛的海湾之间); 确实地点不详

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with mid.bar (מִדְבָּר "wilderness" H4057)
§ Sinai = "thorny"
the mountain where Moses received the Law from Jehovah; located at the southern end of the Sinai peninsula between the horns of the Red Sea; exact site unknown
